item.title: Velox Networks claims that it can offer B2B phone services at a 95% lower cost
item.description: Velox Networks, a new telecommunications company in Singapore, offers a voice over internet protocol (VoIP) and cloud-based private branch exchange (PBX) communications platform. They claim their service could save businesses up to 95% compared to traditional major telcos. Currently, Singaporean businesses primarily use traditional PBXs for business-to-business communication. Velox aims to change this with its affordable, cloud-based PBX solution that surpasses the quality of free VoIP services, which often rely on less dependable consumer-grade technology.
